entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1 except near minus 5 over the Highlands. POP 60%

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 3 over the Highlands.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning except plus 1 over the Highlands.
